display_name: Gastrointestinal Quality of Life Index: Symptoms subscore (weighted)
description:
The subscale score is based on 19 items from the Gastrointestinal Quality of Life Index. A high score suggests fewer symptoms. [Eypasch E et al.,1995 (PubMed ID: 7749697)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/7749697/)

[Search for all GIQLI variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/abc/variables?search=giqli)
